scrape.title: The dinner
scrape.author: Layla
scrape.text: The narrator is as unreliable as it gets. A father with psychological issues, manifesting as episodes of psychotic rage, wanting to protect his son at all costs. He and his wife are truly reprehensible people. Not because of their desire to protect their son, who-without giving too much away-has done a truly horrible thing, but because of their moral revisionism, their sense that their son's actions can be excused in some way.
